title: Why Exercise?
description: From riding bikes to playing sports, exercise is hard work! Why Exercise? introduces readers to many different ways to push their bodies to work hard and explains how exercise can make them feel. These connections make this book ideal for teaching cause-and-effect relationships. This book also helps build readers' confidence through the use of predictive text and detailed, relatable photographs that can help them connect to the text and activate their prior knowledge.
